title: Chinese official calls for protection of space assets, international coordination mechanisms
summary: China needs to accelerate the development of space asset protection policies and related international coordination mechanisms, according to a space industry official.

title: Slingshot Aerospace closes $25 million fundraising round
summary: Slingshot Aerospace, a company that develops technologies for space situational awareness, announced March 10 it has raised $25 million in Series A-1 funds.

title: Omnibus bill cuts funding for future weather satellites
summary: Appropriators cut funding for a new generation of weather satellites while increasing funding for the Office of Space Commerce for fiscal year 2022.

title: SpaceX rapidly reuses converted Falcon Heavy booster
summary: SpaceX has reflown a converted Falcon Heavy side booster just 37 days after its first mission as a Falcon 9 rocket, successfully...

title: Voters block agreement for planned Georgia spaceport
summary: Voters in a Georgia county have dealt a potentially fatal blow to a proposed spaceport, a move that may provide lessons for other prospective spaceports.
